named-native-query.name: PatientService.searchpatients
named-native-query.query: SELECT PAT.FIRST_NAME, PAT.LAST_NAME, PAT.PHONE_NUMBER, PAT.UHID FROM PHARMACY.PATIENT PAT WHERE UPPER(CONCAT(PAT.FIRST_NAME, PAT.LAST_NAME)) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', :name ,'%'))

named-native-query.name: SupplierService.getBySupplierCode
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUPPLIER WHERE CODE=:code

named-native-query.name: InventoryService.updateInventoryByIdAndStatus
named-native-query.query: UPDATE INVENTORY SET STATUS = :status WHERE ID = :id

named-native-query.name: PatientService.findPatientByUhid
named-native-query.query: select PAT.ID, PAT.FIRST_NAME, PAT.LAST_NAME, PAT.UHID, PAT.PHONE_NUMBER, FLOOR(DATEDIFF(NOW(), PAT.DATE_OF_BIRTH) / 365.25) AS AGE, PAT.GENDER, '' AS ORDER_NUMBER, '' ORDER_STATUS FROM PHARMACY.PATIENT PAT WHERE PAT.UHID = :uhid

named-native-query.name: InventoryService.getSearchedInventoryOrder
named-native-query.query: SELECT I.SUPPLIER_CODE, S.NAME AS SUPPLIER_NAME, ID.DRUG_CODE, D.NAME AS DRUG_NAME, ID.BATCH_NUMBER, ID.HSN_CODE, ID.EXPIRY_DATE, ID.QUANTITY, ID.SELLING_COST, ID.TOTAL_SELLING_COST, T.CGST, T.SGST FROM PHARMACY.INVENTORY I LEFT JOIN PHARMACY.INVENTORY_DETAILS ID ON ID.INVENTORY_DETAILS_ID = I.ID LEFT JOIN PHARMACY.TAX_CATEGORY T ON T.CODE = ID.HSN_CODE LEFT JOIN PHARMACY.DRUG_SETUP D ON (D.ID) = ID.DRUG_CODE LEFT JOIN PHARMACY.SUPPLIER S ON S.CODE = I.SUPPLIER_CODE WHERE UPPER(D.NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%', :name, '%') || UPPER(S.NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%', :name,'%') || ID.BATCH_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', :name,'%')

named-native-query.name: SupplierService.findSupplierCodeAndName
named-native-query.query: SELECT CODE, NAME AS VALUE FROM SUPPLIER

named-native-query.name: DrugSetupService.findAllDrugByName
named-native-query.query: SELECT D.ID, D.NAME, D.TYPE, D.HSN_CODE, D.GENERIC_NAME, T.SGST, T.CGST, T.IGST, D.STATUS FROM PHARMACY.DRUG_SETUP D LEFT JOIN PHARMACY.TAX_CATEGORY T ON T.CODE = D.HSN_CODE WHERE D.STATUS = 'A' AND D.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', :name ,'%') ORDER BY D.NAME ASC;

named-native-query.name: InventoryService.getInventoryDashboard
named-native-query.query: SELECT I.ID, I.SUPPLIER_CODE, I.INVENTORY_NUMBER, I.INVOICE_NUMBER, I.INVOICE_DATE, I.INVOICE_AMT, I.STATUS, I.CREATED_BY FROM PHARMACY.INVENTORY I
